name: Tile Garden: Zen Triple Match
description:
Trek into the garden to solve interesting Mahjong puzzles! Tile Garden classic triple match & puzzle game, where you pick the same flower or plant to match and clear a level.

Game features

- 50+ styles of tiles: Flowers, Leaves, Animals and Zen.
- 5+ skins and themes: Garden , Mountains, Japanese, ... Unlock by Worlds!
- 10+ Jigsaw puzzles to unlock and complete
- Thousands of layouts along with multiple power ups!
- Break the piggy bank to collect your treasure
- Open chests and collect surprise gifts

Download free and start your adventure with Tile Garden
